H0.text: Forest was the most likely covering of the area in which the gilled organism lived, as indicated by the scientistâ€™s fossil discovery.

H1.text: Grassland is the area most likely to have covered the habitat of the organism with gills when it was alive, based on the scientist's fossil discovery.

H2.text: Bare rock is the area in which a living organism with gills was most likely to have been covered.

H3.text: Water is the most likely covering of the area in which the fossilized organism with gills lived.

A4.text: A gill is a specialized respiratory organ that many aquatic animals use for aquatic gas exchange

A5.text: The delicate nature of the gills is possible because the surrounding water provides support
